description: Filters points based on the value of the specified bitfield attribute.
title: PointCloud Bitfield Filter

___field.description: The name of the field that is used for the filter.

___requiredClearBits.description: List ALL bit numbers that must cleared (=0) for the point to be kept. bit 0 is LSB.

___requiredSetBits.description: List ALL bit numbers that must set (=1) for the point to be kept. bit 0 is LSB.
